title: Direct Response Video Editor / Creative Strategist (E-Com & Supplements)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly skilled Video Editor & Creative Strategist with a direct response mindset to help us craft high-converting ad creatives for our fast-growing e-commerce brand in the supplement / wellness niche.

If you’re someone who lives and breathes performance marketing, understands how to stop the scroll, maximize hold rate, and drive conversions, this role is for you.

This is not a job for cinematic editors or motion graphic-heavy creatives - we’re looking for someone who understands minimalistic, clean, psychology-backed creative that performs on platforms like Meta, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and beyond.

What You’ll Be Doing:
- Taking raw footage (UGC, voiceovers, testimonials, etc.) and editing into direct response video ads

- Creating short-form videos, product demos, educational reels, and VSLs

- Writing or advising on script angles, hook frameworks, and cut structures to optimize watch-through and CTR

- Collaborating with our team to analyze ad performance and make creative iterations based on data and psychology

- Crafting content that aligns with our brand tone: clean, feminine, modern, and conversion-focused

Must-Have Experience:
- Proven track record of editing high-performing e-com ads (please show examples!)

- Experience with supplement, skincare, wellness, or health brands is a major plus

- Deep understanding of direct response principles, scroll-stopping hooks, offer presentation, and marketing psychology

- Familiarity with short-form and VSL ad formats

- Mastery of editing tools like Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or CapCut

- Ability to work fast, hit deadlines, and handle feedback professionally

Bonus If You:
- Have copywriting or creative strategy experience

- Are familiar with voiceover AI tools, stock UGC assembly, or AI UGC workflow

- Understand the importance of the first 3 seconds and can optimize for platform-specific nuances
